doc.name: mobileAdGetTopLeft
doc.summary: Returns the topLeft position of an ad.

description.overview: Use the mobileAdGetTopLeft function to retrieve the top left postition of an ad.

parameter.name: adName
parameter.description: The name of ad (as specified in mobileAdCreate).

description.value:
Returns the topLeft position of an ad. This is 2 comma separated values giving the left and top coordinates of the ad relative to the topLeft corner of the stack, which is 0,0.
Returns "ad not found" if the ad does not exist.
description.comments:
The mobileGetTopLeft function returns the topLeft position of an ad.
Before calling this function you must have registered your app's id using mobileAdRegister. If not, the result will contain "not registered with service".
